title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: The file remains unchanged, but it is marked as dirty after using code assist.
OB: 1122. Open a Java file and navigate to a method call. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of the method call.
EB: After performing code assist (CtrlSpace), the file remains unchanged but is marked as dirty.
